name: branch-review
description: GitHub-style pull request review workflow for local development with AI feedback integration.

branchReview.prompt.header.default:
# Code Review Feedback

I have reviewed the changes in this branch and have the following feedback:
branchReview.prompt.header.markdownDescription: Text that appears at the beginning of your review prompt. Supports markdown formatting.

branchReview.prompt.footer.default:
---

Please address these review comments and make the necessary changes. Once you've made the fixes, please commit the changes with an appropriate commit message. Let me know when you're done and I can review the updates.
branchReview.prompt.footer.markdownDescription: Text that appears at the end of your review prompt. Supports markdown formatting.

scripts.build:webview: mkdir -p out/webview/controllers && cp src/webview/webview.html out/webview/ && cp src/webview/app.js out/webview/ && cp src/webview/events.js out/webview/ && cp src/webview/controllers/*.js out/webview/controllers/ && npm run build:css && cp node_modules/@hotwired/stimulus/dist/stimulus.js out/webview/stimulus.min.js && node scripts/build-prism.js
scripts.build:css: cat src/webview/styles/_base.css src/webview/styles/_header.css src/webview/styles/_buttons.css src/webview/styles/_diff.css src/webview/styles/_comments.css src/webview/styles/_search.css src/webview/styles/_utilities.css > out/webview/webview.css
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run watch
scripts.clean-build: npm run compile && rm -f *.vsix && npx @vscode/vsce package
